column1: Has anyone had a stay at the sura design hotel and suite please
Lots of people have stayed there...https://www.google.com/url…
Tahir, Sura Design Hotel also has the "Covid-19 Safety certificate", issued by the Turkish government. "https://ktb.gov.tr/genel/searchhotel.en.aspx…".enigma...
Many thanks enigma on form as always this is very helpful as I am treating my son as it is his birthday the day after we arrive to Istanbul
I have asked the hotel if they can arrange a nice surprise for him
